Articles.Content:
These are some vague ideas for hot Venus-like planet exploration.

Visiting such planet woudl require cooling module and coolant containers.

When you enter planets atmosphere, temperature indicator shows up. Above specific temperature, ship without cooling module, or without coolant explodes.

Staying in hot areas of atmosphere, depletes coolant in pace proportional to temperature. So time you can spend inside atmosphere is limited. It woudl add dramatic flavor to exploration. Player woudl need to calsulate time spent on surface.

Lower in atmosphere ship sinks, hotter it gets. Temparature is fluctuating so even if you stay in one place it can get hotter or colder by few degrees. Specific parts of planet woudl also be hotter and warmer.

And with weather system implementation? Oh no, the storm is coming! Gotta get out from here fast or clouds of boiling acid will fry my ship.

As for graphic effects, watch this video.

Ultra atmospheric distorsion.
